alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:24PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WILDFIRE SMOKE EXPECTED TO INCREASE TONIGHT OVER SHERIDAN COUNTY... Smoke from Canadian wildfires is expected to increase tonight as a weak cold front moves into the area. Smoke concentrations are forecast to be similar if not worse than last Thursday. Those with respiratory conditions should take precautions tonight to prevent exposure to this increased wildfire smoke. All persons should plan to limit outdoor exposure until smoke concentrations diminish, likely on Monday or Tuesday. Please refer to the website fire.airnow.gov for the current air quality in your area as well as tips to keep you healthy during this period of concentrated wildfire smoke. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Dayton, Granite Pass, Big Horn, Clearmont, Leiter, Arvada, Parkman, Banner, Burgess Junction and Story.
